item.title: How can i edit stats on a 508?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

You can change the file extension and get something like this.

username:testo password:37763251 rights:0 absx:3212 absy:3424 runenergy:100 attackstyle:0 autoretaliate:0 specialamount:100 skulltimer:0 gender:0 SlayerTask:0 SlayerAm:0 Room0:1 Room1:0 Room2:0 Room3:0 Room4:1 Room0Type:6 Room1Type:0 Room2Type:0 Room3Type:0 Room4Type:7 Garden:0 Garden1:0 Garden2:0 Garden3:0 Garden4:1 DragonSlayer:0 QuestPoints:0 Update:2 LoadedBackup:0 FamiliarType:0 ClanName:0 HouseDecor:1585 look0:0 look1:10 look2:18 look3:26 look4:33 look5:36 look6:42 skill0:1,0 skill1:1,0 skill2:1,0 skill3:10,1154 skill4:1,0 skill5:1,0 skill6:1,0 skill7:1,0 skill8:1,0 skill9:1,0 skill10:1,0 skill11:1,0 skill12:1,0 skill13:1,0 skill14:1,0 skill15:1,0 skill16:1,0 skill17:1,0 skill18:1,0 skill19:1,0 skill20:1,0 skill21:1,0 skill22:1,0 skill23:1,0 skill24:1,0 null

Then edit it and change it back to DAT extension.
